title: What font is this?
content:
This is the title font from Blanc Magazine, I'm desperate to know what the font name is?

Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image (43).jpeg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415235756/http:/typophile.com/files/image%20(43).jpeg) | 16 KB |
author: brydiemack

comments.content:
[http://commercialtype.com/typefaces/dala\_floda/dala\_floda/roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415235756/http:/commercialtype.com/typefaces/dala_floda/dala_floda/roman "http://commercialtype.com/typefaces/dala\_floda/dala\_floda/roman")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/blankisthenewblack/volterra/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415235756/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/blankisthenewblack/volterra/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/blankisthenewblack/volterra/")  
2 kinds of Bodoni stencil.  
They are not the right one but they are near of it.  
good luck.

[Sensaway Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415235756/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/gestalten/sensaway_pro_light). Some more in the same vein [Avia](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415235756/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/avia/) Light, [Dala Floda](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415235756/http:/commercialtype.com/typefaces/dala_floda/dala_floda), [Shaolin Style](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415235756/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/testpilot/shaolin-style)  
If you need more, have a look to [Typecache Font Cluster: Stencil Serif Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415235756/http:/typecache.com/font-clusters/05/)
